data.name: ThePowerCoin
data.description:
The Power Project claims to take on an ambitious goal to redefine the electricity distribution and control network. It is claimed that with the rise in eMobiles, it is only a matter of time that the demand for charging stations will rise dramatically. The Power Project aims to help users find the nearest charging station without any hassle. It further claims that it will give users the opportunity to become an energy-distributor to offer their electricity to different users.
